title: Hour 3 - Michael Wilbon (03-26-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Michael Wilbon (03-26-20)
description:
Dan and The Danettes welcome Pardon The Interruption co-host Michael Wilbon. Thank you to today's sponsors: Geico = Visit Geico.com. In just 15 minutes you could save 15% or more on car insurance.   Sleepnumber = Experience the best sleep of your life, visit sleepnumber.com/patrick. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
